name: shed-shell
effect: Held: The holder is unaffected by any moves or abilities that would prevent it from actively leaving battle.
short_effect: Held: Holder can bypass all trapping effects and switch out. Multi-turn moves still cannot be switched out of.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A tough, discarded carapace to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to switch with a waiting Pokémon in battle.
flavor_text.platinum: A tough, discarded carapace to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to switch with a waiting Pokémon in battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A tough, discarded carapace to be held by a Pokémon. It enables the holder to switch with a waiting Pokémon in battle.
